channel.title: Krause Studio Work Cases / Projects
channel.description: Krause Studio will showcase each case they've developed, designed, creatively directed, etc. Please subscripe to the channel to keep up to date with new showcased projects, and stay ajour in the graphic design and web development industry.

item.title: Krause Studio → Point of You → Modern Consulting 2.0
item.description: Discover how Asger Krause and Point of You's direction designed and developed a full visual identity as well as a website for their corporate visual identity.

item.title: Krause Studio → Krause Studio → True Freelancing Starts Now
item.description: Learn how visual heritage and the touch of Krause Studio has developed, which changes that comes with a re-branding, and discover how we designed a new Studio.

item.title: Krause Studio → Olioli Poké → The Joy of People and Food
item.description: Olioli Poké needed Krause Studio's Webflow expert developer skills to develop all creative design ideas, and transform business ideas into a corporate webpage.

item.title: Krause Studio → Upscaled → Twisted Influencer Marketing
item.description: Krause Studio was hired as designers of Upscaled's visual identity and design their website. Learn how we designed their brand, and made their Webflow webpage.

item.title: Krause Studio → JOE & THE JUICE → Cultural Adaption Webpage
item.description: Learn how you can take a brand from a being expressed very dark and urban-ish into a bright, Miami-ish identity. All to align with a change of store visuals.

item.title: Krause Studio → JOE & THE JUICE → Worldwide Wall Menus
item.description: Asger Krause worked as a supervisor and designer for JOE & THE JUICE's worldwide menu change. Learn how to build a lean structure & design 300 menus, in 2 days.

item.title: Krause Studio → Flip Flip Flip → From Flipping to Snapping
item.description: Discover how we designed the identity and webpage for a well-known DJ who was to re-brand his business into being a professional art photographer called "Flip".
